statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, game_title, review_text FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, player_name, rating FROM feedback_reviews WHERE game_title = 'Chess';
SELECT player_name, review_text, date_posted FROM feedback_reviews ORDER BY date_posted DESC;
SELECT game_title, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM feedback_reviews GROUP BY game_title HAVING total_reviews > 5;
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY date_posted DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT player_name, game_title, review_text FROM feedback_reviews WHERE player_name = 'Alice' AND rating = 5
SELECT DISTINCT game_title, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_reviews FROM feedback_reviews GROUP BY game_title HAVING total_reviews > 10 ORDER BY total_reviews DESC
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating, player_name FROM feedback_reviews GROUP BY player_name HAVING avg_rating > 3
SELECT player_name, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_reviews FROM feedback_reviews WHERE date_posted BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY player_name ORDER BY total_reviews DESC
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT player_name, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 100;
SELECT * FROM reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_text FROM reviews WHERE review_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT id, feedback_text, player_name FROM feedback WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT player_name, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT reviewer_name, review_text, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM review_date) AS month FROM reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM feedback;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, player_id FROM player_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT game_id, review_text, rating FROM game_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT distinct development_team_id, development_progress FROM game_development;
SELECT review_id, player_id, game_id, timestamp FROM game_reviews WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM player_feedback GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM game_reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT game_id, development_progress FROM game_development WHERE development_team_id = 456 AND release_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, review_text FROM game_reviews JOIN player_feedback ON game_reviews.player_id = player_feedback.player_id WHERE player_id = 789 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback;
SELECT id, player_id, creation_date FROM player_reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT feedback, creation_date FROM player_feedback WHERE id = 3;
SELECT review_text, review_score FROM player_reviews WHERE player_id = 7;
SELECT feedback_id, improvement_suggestions FROM game_development_feedback WHERE response_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM player_feedback ORDER BY creation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, feedback FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, AVG(review_score) AS average_score FROM player_reviews GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM game_development_feedback WHERE improvement_suggestions LIKE '%bug%' ORDER BY response_date ASC;

SELECT p.player_id, g.game_id, gs.score FROM game_scores gs JOIN player_reviews pr ON gs.player_id = pr.player_id JOIN player_feedback pf ON gs.player_id = pf.player_id JOIN game_development_feedback gdf ON pf.id = gdf.feedback_id JOIN (SELECT player_id, MAX(review_date) AS latest_review_date FROM player_reviews GROUP BY player_id) lr ON pr.player_id = lr.player_id AND pr.review_date = lr.latest_review_date JOIN (SELECT feedback_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM game_development_feedback GROUP BY feedback_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) tf ON gdf.id = tf.feedback_id JOIN (SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM player_reviews GROUP BY player_id) tr ON pr.player_id = tr.player_id WHERE pr.review_score >= 4 ORDER BY gs.score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM PlayerFeedback;
SELECT player_id, feedback_content FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT player_id, rating FROM GameReviews WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM GameData WHERE game_name LIKE '%Adventure%';
SELECT comment_id, comment_content FROM ReviewComments ORDER BY comment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE player_id=1;
SELECT player_id, rating FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT review_content, rating FROM GameReviews WHERE player_id=5 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT player_id, feedback_content FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE player_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM GameData WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
